about_the_game:
The original soundtrack from True love ~Confide to the maple~
The format is 320kbps bit rate of MP3 and wav.
24.Eternal Wait-Confide to the maple-Singing Edition Only MP3 version.

Album contains:

01.Maple and sea
02.Maple Township - Prelude -
03.Fenghua high school- impression Song-
04.FengYi Accompany
05.FengXi Accompany
06.Ocean Sounds
07.Lolita paradise
08.Noisy Harbour City
09.Floating city
10.Fenghua high school-piano solo-
11.Flamingo
12.gentle breeze
13.Raining night
14.Sakura memories
15.Memories emerge
16.Miss you very much
17.FengXi Accompany-piano solo-
18.Miss you very much-piano solo-
19.Tears of maple
20.Born to die
21.Miss you very much-accompaniment-
22.Maple and sea-accompaniment-
23.Eternal Wait-Confide to the maple-
24.Eternal Wait-Confide to the maple-Singing Edition

  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
